title: Driving donations for GOSH’s flagship Christmas appeal | Torchbox

metadata.description: Read about our award-nominated work with GOSH that reached its highest cash appeal amount in five years—even amidst anticipated challenges from the cost of living crisis. Remarkably, in just six weeks, raising just over £220,000.
